title: Provide Event Schedule for a Festival
description: A visitor at a music festival wants to know the performance schedule for the main stage today.

tasks.description: Identify the event (music festival) and the specific request (main stage schedule for today).
Retrieve the event schedule from the information system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the list of bands and their set times for the main stage.

tasks.description: Communicate the schedule to the visitor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly lists the bands and their performance times.
